00030 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_LITERAL_H
00031 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_LITERAL_H
00032 
00033 // Checks if a variable is equal to a value.
00034 template<typename Var>
00035   struct WatchLiteralConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00036 {
00037   virtual string constraint_name()
00038     { return "WatchedLiteral"; }
00039 
00040   Var var;
00041 
00042   DomainInt val;
00043 
00044   template<typename T>
00045   WatchLiteralConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _val) :
00046     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var), val(_val) {}
00047 
00048   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00049   { return 0; }
00050 
00051   virtual void full_propagate()
00052   { var.propagateAssign(val); }
00053 
00054 
00055   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00056   {
00057     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInRange);
00058     var.propagateAssign(val);
00059   }
00060 
00061   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00062   {
00063     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00064     return (v[0] == val);
00065   }
00066 
00067   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00068   { 
00069     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00070     vars.reserve(1);
00071     vars.push_back(var);
00072     return vars;
00073   }
00074 
00075   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00076   { 
00077     if(var.inDomain(val))
00078     {
00079         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, val));
00080         return true;
00081     }
00082     else
00083         return false;
00084   }
00085 };
00086 
00087 template<typename VarArray1>
00088 AbstractConstraint*
00089 BuildCT_WATCHED_LIT(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00090 { 
00091   return new WatchLiteralConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00092     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0][0]); 
00093 }
00094 
00095 #endif
